/* /allowance/allowanceMapper.xml - allowanceList ( allowanceList 기본 조회 ) */ SELECT sal_type as salType /* 비용종류 */ ,format(scom_hh_cst,0) as scomHhCst /*주간근무시간당비용*/ ,format(scom_nh_cst,0) as scomNhCst /*야간근무시간당비용*/ ,format(scom_lh_cst,0) as scomLhCst /*지각*/ ,format(scom_elh_cst,0) as scomElhCst /*식대*/ ,format(semp_cmc,0) as sempCmc /*차량유지비*/ ,scom_yymm as scomYymm /*등록년월*/ FROM personnelmanagement.sal_common /* sal_common Table */ WHERE sal_type = #{divSal}
